lead_paragraph: Derek Lokey, the starting defensive tackle for No. 5 Texas, broke his leg Saturday in the Longhorns’ victory over Nebraska and will be out indefinitely. Lokey fractured the fibula in his lower leg in the second quarter. Surgery is scheduled for later this week. Lokey had 24 tackles this season.
